home.title: ChatGameLab
home.splashDescription: An educational platform for creating and playing AI-powered text-adventure games. Perfect for teachers, students, and creative storytellers.

features.title: Why Choose ChatGameLab?
features.subtitle: Discover the perfect blend of education and entertainment

create.title: Create Adventures
create.description: Design interactive text adventures powered by AI

play.title: Play Together
play.description: Join friends in collaborative storytelling sessions

learn.title: Learn & Teach
learn.description: Perfect for educational workshops and classroom activities

understand.title: Understand AI
understand.description: Explore how AI models create stories and learn how they work

languageSwitcher.wipHint: More languages are work in progress. Only English and German are available right now.

footer.jffTitle: JFF - Institute for Educational Research and Innovation

apiKeys.title: API Key Management
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for AI platforms.
apiKeys.noKeys: You don't have any API keys yet.

aboutSection.title: About API Keys
aboutSection.description: API keys are used to connect to AI platforms for generating game content.

createModal.title: Add New API Key
createModal.keyDescription: Your key will be encrypted and stored securely.

editModal.title: Edit API Key
editModal.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for this key

deleteModal.title: Delete API Key
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
deleteModal.warning: This action cannot be undone. The key will be permanently deleted.

errors.invalidPlatform: Invalid platform selected. Please choose a valid AI platform.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load API keys. Please try again.

unsupportedPlatform.hint: This platform is currently not supported. You can only remove existing keys.

empty.title: No games yet
empty.description: Create your first game to get started with interactive AI-powered adventures.

createModal.title: Create New Game
createModal.info: Fill in the details below to create a new game. You can always edit these later.
createModal.publicDescription: Public games are discoverable by everyone.

viewModal.title: Game Details
viewModal.readOnlyNotice: This game was created by another user. You can view the details but cannot edit. Use "Copy" to create your own editable version.

editModal.title: Edit Game
editModal.info: Update your game settings below. Changes are saved when you click Save.

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

tabs.basicInfo: General info about the game. This is just for you and won't affect gameplay.
tabs.storyInfo: Everything here is sent to the AI to set up your game world and story.
tabs.styleInfo: Optional visual settings for how the game looks when playing.

editFields.name: Game Name
editFields.description: Give the game a short description. This is just for you.
editFields.imageStyle: What style should the game's images have?
editFields.imageStyleHint: For example: cartoon, realistic, pixel art, watercolor...
editFields.scenarioHint: Briefly describe: Where does the game take place? Who are you? What is the goal? Any important rules?
editFields.scenarioPlaceholder: You are an explorer in a mysterious forest. Your goal is to find the hidden treasure...
editFields.gameStartHint: What happens at the start? Describe the first scene that the player sees. How is the player welcomed?
editFields.gameStartPlaceholder: You wake up at the edge of a dark forest. A narrow path leads deeper into the trees...
editFields.statusFieldsHint: What should the game keep track of? For example health, points, or ammo. The game remembers these values and updates them while playing.
editFields.firstMessageHint: Pre-generated opening message for quick game start.
editFields.firstStatusHint: Initial status values for the quick start.
editFields.quickStartInfo: Quick start content is pre-generated to allow instant game starts.

statusFieldsEditor.noFields: No values yet. Click + to add a new value.
statusFieldsEditor.invalidJson: Invalid JSON format. Fix errors before switching to Visual mode.

view.noGameStart: No game start message defined yet.

deleteModal.title: Delete Game
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
deleteModal.warning: This action cannot be undone. All game data will be permanently deleted.

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load games. Please try again.

importExport.description: Export your game configuration to share with others, or import a configuration to update this game.
importExport.exportDescription: Download the game configuration as a YAML file.
importExport.importDescription: Upload a YAML file to update this game's configuration.
importExport.importError: Failed to import game configuration. Please check the YAML format.

empty.title: No games yet
empty.description: Create your first game to get started with interactive AI-powered adventures.

restartConfirm.title: Restart Game
restartConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to restart "{{game}}"? Your current progress will be lost.

copyConfirm.title: Copy Game
copyConfirm.message: This will create a copy of "{{name}}" in your games.

empty.title: No games found
empty.description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new games.

restartConfirm.title: Restart Game
restartConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to restart "{{game}}"? Your current progress will be lost.

copyConfirm.title: Copy Game
copyConfirm.message: This will create a copy of "{{name}}" in your games.

empty.title: No games played yet
empty.description: Start a new game to begin your adventure!

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load your games. Please try again.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Session
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session for "{{game}}"? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No games found
empty.description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new games.

cloneModal.title: Clone Game
cloneModal.message: This will create a copy of "{{name}}" in your games.

cloneSuccess.title: Game Cloned
cloneSuccess.message: "{{name}}" has been added to your games.

loading.startingHint: The AI is preparing your adventure

needsApiKey.title: API Key Required
needsApiKey.description: The API key used for this session is no longer available. Please select a new one to continue playing.
needsApiKey.reason: Your previous API key is no longer available. To continue your game, please select a new one.

selectApiKey.title: Select API Key
selectApiKey.keyDescription: Select the API key to use for this game session
selectApiKey.modelDescription: Optionally select a specific AI model
selectApiKey.noKeys: You need at least one API key to play. Add one in Settings → API Keys.

hints.type: player = user input, game = AI response, system = context
hints.imagePrompt: Prompt sent to image generation AI
hints.statusFields: Game state variables tracked by AI
hints.isStreaming: Whether content is still being received

organizations.title: Manage Organizations
organizations.name: Name
organizations.empty: No organizations yet. Create one to get started.
organizations.inviteDescription: Send an invitation to join {{name}} as the organization head.
organizations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
organizations.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this organization?

invites.title: Pending Invites
invites.searchPlaceholder: Search by email, role, status, or organization...

revokeConfirm.title: Delete Invite
revokeConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this invite? This action cannot be undone.

users.title: Manage Users
users.name: Name
users.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, role, or organization...
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
users.promoteConfirm: Are you sure you want to promote "{{name}}" ({{email}}) to admin?
users.promoteWarning: This user will gain full administrative access to the system.
users.removeAdminConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove admin role from "{{name}}" ({{email}})?
users.removeAdminWarning: This user will lose all administrative privileges.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.inviteDescription: You have been invited to join as {{role}}.
notifications.declineConfirm: Are you sure you want to decline this invitation?

myOrganization.title: My Organization
myOrganization.noOrganizationDescription: You are not a member of any organization.

apiKeys.title: Organization API Keys
apiKeys.aboutDescription: API keys shared here are available to all members of your organization for playing games. Only heads and teachers can manage these keys.
apiKeys.comingSoon: Organization API key management coming soon.
apiKeys.notAuthorized: You don't have permission to manage organization API keys. Only heads and teachers can access this page.
apiKeys.loadError: Failed to load organization API keys.
apiKeys.noKeys: No API keys shared with this organization yet.
apiKeys.allowPublicSponsoringDesc: This key can be used to sponsor games for all users.
apiKeys.noResults: No API keys match your search.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.subtitle: Manage workshops and invite participants to collaborate on games.
workshops.notAuthorized: You don't have permission to manage workshops. Only heads and teachers can access this page.
workshops.name: Name
workshops.activeDescription: Active workshops allow participants to join and create games.
workshops.inviteDescription: Generate an invite link that participants can use to join this workshop.
workshops.inviteLinkHint: Share this link with participants. Anyone with the link can join the workshop.
workshops.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
workshops.deleteWarning: All games and sessions in this workshop will be deleted. This cannot be undone.

myOrganization.name: Name
myOrganization.inviteTeacherDescription: Send an invitation to a teacher to join your organization.
myOrganization.inviteUserDescription: Send an invitation to a user to join your organization without a specific role.
myOrganization.inviteAlreadyExists: A pending invitation already exists for this email address.
myOrganization.inviteError: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.
myOrganization.promoteConfirm: Are you sure you want to promote "{{name}}" ({{email}}) to Head?
myOrganization.promoteWarning: This user will gain the ability to manage organization members and invite teachers.
myOrganization.demoteConfirm: Are you sure you want to demote "{{name}}" ({{email}}) to Teacher?
myOrganization.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove "{{name}}" from the organization?
myOrganization.removeWarning: This user will lose access to the organization.
myOrganization.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{{name}}"?
myOrganization.leaveWarning: You will lose access to all organization resources and members.

accept.title: Join Workshop
accept.inviteMessage: You have been invited to join a workshop of organization "{{organization}}".
accept.inviteMessageSimple: You have been invited to join this workshop.

success.title: Welcome!
success.message: You've successfully joined the workshop. Redirecting...

errors.notFound: This invite link is invalid or has been revoked.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load invite details. Please try again.
errors.acceptFailed: Failed to accept invite. Please try again.

switchWorkshop.title: Switch Workshop?
switchWorkshop.warning: You are currently in workshop "{{currentWorkshop}}". Joining "{{newWorkshop}}" will remove you from your current workshop.
switchWorkshop.message: Your games and progress in the current workshop will remain, but you won't be able to access them until you rejoin.

myGames.title: My Games
myGames.empty: No games yet. Create your first game!

myRooms.title: My Rooms
myRooms.empty: No rooms yet. Create a room to play with others!

lastPlayed.title: Last Played
lastPlayed.empty: No play history yet. Start playing a game!

mainSite.title: ChatGameLab Project
mainSite.description: Learn more about the educational project behind this platform.

mismatch.title: Version Mismatch Detected
mismatch.message: Frontend version <frontendVersion>{{frontendVersion}}</frontendVersion> does not match backend version <backendVersion>{{backendVersion}}</backendVersion>. This may cause unexpected behavior. Contact support if issues persist.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.backendUserFetch: Failed to load user data from server. Please try again.
errors.conflict: This action conflicts with existing data. Please try again.
errors.invalidPlatform: Invalid platform selected. Please choose a valid option.
errors.userNotRegistered: You need to complete registration before continuing.
errors.invalidApiKey: Your API key is invalid or expired. Please check your API key in Settings.
errors.orgVerificationRequired: Your OpenAI organization needs verification to use the image generation feature. Please verify at https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/general.
errors.billingNotActive: Your OpenAI account is not active. Please check your billing details at https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.insufficientQuota: Your API key has run out of credits. Please add more credits or use a different API key.
errors.contentFiltered: Your request was filtered by the AI's content policy. Please try rephrasing.
errors.aiError: The AI service encountered an error. Please try again.
errors.workshopInactive: This workshop has been deactivated. Please contact your teacher or workshop organizer.
errors.invalidToken: Your session has expired or is invalid. Please use your invite link again.

login.title: Welcome to ChatGameLab
login.subtitle: Choose how you want to sign in
login.devModeDescription: Quick login for development and testing

devModeAlert.title: Development Mode
devModeAlert.message: This is the development login page. In production, you'll be redirected directly to Auth0.

redirecting.title: Redirecting to Auth0...
redirecting.message: Please wait while we redirect you to the login page.

register.title: Complete Your Profile
register.subtitle: Just a few more details to get started
register.nameDescription: This is how other users will see you. Max 24 characters.
register.emailDescription: We'll use this for important notifications.

errors.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 24 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings
settings.nameDescription: This is how other users will see you. Max 24 characters.
settings.emailDescription: We'll use this for important notifications.
settings.showAiModelSelectorDescription: When enabled, you can choose which AI model to use each time you start a game session.
settings.emailChangeNote: To change your email address, please contact the site administrator.

errors.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 24 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
